spell.name: Keystone Signet
entries: Activate the ancient Keystone Signet, recharging most of your signets and giving them extra power.
You regain all expended uses of your signets which require you to finish a short rest, except {@spell Keystone Signet|GuildWars}.

For the duration, when you target a hostile creature with a signet, target each creature other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@dice 2d12} psychic damage and can't cast spells or use abilities until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect. After this spell triggers {@dice 1d4 + 1} times, this spell ends.
{@bold Signet.} Casting this spell does not cost a spell slot. Once you cast this spell, you cannot do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Keystone Signet

Elite Signet. All of your signets except Keystone Signet are recharged. For 20 seconds, the next 0...5...6 time[s] you use a signet that targets a foe, all other foes adjacent to your target take 15...51...60 damage and are interrupted.

spell.name: Gash
entries: You wound your enemy grievously.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and, if the target is {@condition bleeding|GuildWars}, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 6 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 6 adrenaline per level above the original level.
Gash
Sword Attack. If this attack hits a Bleeding foe, you strike for 5...17...20 more damage and that foe suffers a Deep Wound, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd or 3rd level, the number of attacks increases by 1. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the number of attacks increases by 2. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 3.

spell.name: Wild Blow
entries: You imbue your weapon with as much magical power as possible, striking with all your might.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's critical effects and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, any stance on the target ends.
{@bold Unblockable.} This spell ignores any temporary bonuses to AC.
{@bold Adrenaline.} You lose all adrenaline.
Wild Blow
Melee Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If it hits, this attack will result in a critical hit and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 5th.

spell.name: Flare
entries: Send out a searing hot flare.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage.

{@bold While Overcast}. On a hit, each creature other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target, must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

components.m: a phial of phosphor

entries: Flare
Spell. Send out a flare that strikes target foe for 20...56...65 fire damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, Flare hits adjacent foes as well.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Frenzy
entries: Enter a frenzy, disregarding any defense.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn, but you take 50% more damage.
{@bold Stance.} If you enter a new stance, this stance ends.
Frenzy
Stance. For 8 seconds, you attack 33% faster but take double damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bane Signet

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range make an attack roll

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of making an attack roll.

Choose one attacking creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d8} radiant damage, is knocked {@condition prone} and the attack roll misses. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
{@bold Signet.} Casting this spell does not cost a spell slot. Once you cast this spell, you cannot do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
Bane Signet
Signet. Target foe takes 26...50...56 holy damage. If target foe was attacking, that foe is knocked down.

spell.name: Banish
entries: You reach out your hand and fire a blinding bolt of divine energy.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack roll against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.
If the target is a summoned creature or an undead, you have advantage on the attack roll, and on a hit, it takes an additional {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.

components.m: a crimson piece of paper

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Banish
Spell. Target foe takes 20...49...56 holy damage. This spell does double damage to summoned creatures.

spell.name: Death Nova
entries: Enchant a friendly creature to explode on death, damaging and {@condition corruption|GuildWars|corrupting} everything around it.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, if the creature drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends on the creature and then target each other creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the creature. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage and is corrupted for 1 minute, taking {@damage 1d4} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st and the damage of the corrupted condition increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Death Nova
Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, if target ally dies, all adjacent foes take 26...85...100 damage and are Poisoned for 15 seconds.

spell.name: Deathly Swarm
entries: You send out a swarm of undead locusts.
Choose one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage.

If you hit the target, the attack leaps from the target to a different creature of your choice within 20 feet of the target. Make a new attack roll with disadvantage against the new target, and make a new damage roll, which could cause the attack to leap again.
A creature can be targeted only once by each casting of this spell.

components.m: a jar filled with dirt and plants

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Deathly Swarm
Spell. Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and strikes for 30...78...90 cold damage on up to three targets in the area.

spell.name: Empathy
entries: Increase the empathy of an enemy to an unnatural degree.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save when the target makes an attack roll, the target takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage and when the target makes a damage roll, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Empathy
Hex Spell. For 5...13...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks, that foe takes 10...46...55 damage and deals 1...12...15 less damage.

spell.name: Fire Storm (Guild Wars)
entries: Conjure a storm of fiery bolts, which rain down from the sky.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 120-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 1d10} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

components.m: a pinte of oil

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.
Fire Storm
Spell. Create a Fire Storm at target foe's location. For 10 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 5...29...35 fire damage each second.

spell.name: Backfire
entries: Create an arcane feedback loop in the mind of one creature, causing their spells to become volatile.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target casts a spell of 1st level or higher, the target takes {@damage 1d10} psychic damage per spell slot level.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.
Backfire
Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, that foe takes 35...119...140 damage.

spell.name: Lightning Javelin
entries: Conjure a lighting javelin in your hand and throw it in a straight line, passing through all creatures along its path to its target.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 6d6} lightning damage.
This attack ignores cover provided by other creatures.

On a hit, target each creature, other than you and the target, on the line between you and the target. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} lightning damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
{@bold Armor Penetration.}  This spell's lightning damage cannot be reduced in any way, except by immunities.

components.m: a javelin and a piece of fleece

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Lightning Javelin

Spell. Send out a Lightning Javelin that strikes for 15...43...50 lightning damage if it hits. Lightning Javelin interrupts attacking foes. This spell has 25% armor penetration and strikes all foes between you and your target.

spell.name: Meteor
entries: Summon a meteor to crash down.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage, {@damage 4d6} fire damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
{@bold Overcast.} You become {@condition overcast|GuildWars} for 5 rounds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the bludgeoning damage or the fire damage (your choice) increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.
Meteor
Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 7...91...112 fire damage and knocked down.

spell.name: Retribution
entries: Wreath yourself or an ally in retaliatory holy light, which punishes all those who harm you.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, target the creature that dealt the damage. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 50% of the damage they dealt as radiant damage (minimum 1, maximum 10). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

{@bold Bond.} For the duration, your spell save DC and spell attack bonus are reduced by 1.  You can have a maximum number of bonds active at any one time, equal to your spell casting ability modifier (minimum 1). The bond ends if the target of your bond is ever not within 300 feet of you, or you fall {@condition unconscious}. You can end a bond at any time (no action required).

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Retribution
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally takes attack damage, this spell deals 33% of the damage back to the source (maximum 5...17...20 damage).

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage maximum increases by 10 for each slot level above 3rd and the reduction to your spell save DC and spell attack bonus increases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Rodgort's Invocation
entries: Invoke the hellish flames of Rodgort.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 12d6} fire damage and starts {@condition burning|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d6} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

components.m: the scale of a red dragon

entries: Rodgort's Invocation
Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes are struck for 15...99...120 fire damage and set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Read the Wind
entries: You focus your bond with nature to get insight into the air currents and the wind.

For the duration, your ranged weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d4} damage and when you make an attack roll with a ranged weapon, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the attack roll.
{@bold Preparation.} If you cast a new preparation, this preparation ends.

components.m: a stick and a piece of string

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage and attack roll bonus each increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.
Read the Wind
Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows move twice as fast and deal 3...9...10 extra damage.

spell.name: Shielding Hands
entries: Envelop a friendly creature in spectral shielding hands, guarding them from damage.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
When this spell ends, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast. Additionally, you cannot choose to end {@status concentration} on this spell.

components.m: half a dozen bushels of wool

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st and the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Shielding Hands
Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, damage and life steal received by target ally is reduced by 3...15...18. When Shielding Hands ends, that ally is healed for 5...41...50 Health.

spell.name: Orison of Healing
entries: You invigorate one friendly creature with the soothing rays of dawn.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Orison of Healing
Spell. Heal target ally for 20...60...70 Health.

spell.name: Reversal of Fortune
entries: Twist the fate around one friendly creature, healing them instead of harming them.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the next time the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage and the target regains hit points equal to the number rolled.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Reversal of Fortune
Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally would take damage or life steal, that ally gains that amount of Health instead, maximum 15...67...80.

spell.name: Healing Breeze
entries: You invoke a divine healing breeze around one friendly creature you can see, healing them over time.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Healing Breeze
Enchantment Spell. For 15 seconds, target ally gains +4...8...9 Health regeneration.

spell.name: Infuse Health
entries: You sacrifice some of your health to mend another creature's injuries.
Choose one friendly creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. You lose equal to 50% of your current hit points. The target regains hit points equal to 100% of the health lost.

m.text: a drop of your own blood, a needle and a water skin

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 10% for each slot level above 1st.
Infuse Health
Spell. Lose half your current Health. Target other ally is healed for 100...129...136% of the amount you lost.

spell.name: Symbol of Wrath
entries: Sear a holy symbol of wrath on the surrounding ground, smiting all hostile creatures within 10 feet.

Conjure a 10-foot radius, 10-foot high stationary symbol of wrath at your location for the duration. Each creature, other than you, must make a Constitution saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d6} radiant damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Symbol of Wrath
Spell. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location in which the spell was cast take 8...27...32 holy damage each second.

spell.name: Animate Bone Horror
entries: Exploit a nearby corpse to create a Bone Horror.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, the target becomes a {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars}.
The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} remains for the duration or until it reaches zero hit points, at which point it will disintegrate into ash.

The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} is friendly to you and your allies for the duration. If you fall {@condition unconscious}, the {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} becomes hostile towards everything, instead of disintegrating into ash. The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} is in the DMs control.
On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to animate another bone horror this way.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

components.m: pages of an old book

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
Animate Bone Horror
Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 1...14...17 bone horror.

spell.name: Blood Reneawl
entries: Use some of your own blood in a ritual of renewal.
{@bold Sacrifice.} You lose health equal to 15% of your maximum hit points.
For the duration, at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
When this spell ends, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + spellcasting ability modifier.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

components.m: a pinte of blood, a needle and a bag

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Blood Renewal
Enchantment Spell. For 7 seconds, you gain +3...5...6 Health regeneration. When Blood Renewal ends, you gain 40...160...190 Health.

spell.name: Faintheartedness
entries: Curse a creature with faintheartedness making them slower and deteriorating them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, regardless of the target's abilities or magic items, the target can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn and at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} per slot level above 1st.
Faintheartedness
Hex Spell. For the next 3...13...16 seconds, target foe attacks 50% slower, and that foe suffers -0...2...3 Health degeneration.

spell.name: Life Siphon
entries: Create a tether of life essence between you and another creature, siphoning away their vitality.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Life Siphon
Hex Spell. For 12...22...24 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3...3 Health degeneration, and you gain +1...3...3 Health regeneration.

spell.name: Soul Barbs
entries: Curse a target to suffer each time they are targeted by another spell.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration if the target is the target of a spell which requires {@status concentration} or is an Enchantment/Hex, the target takes {@damage 2d10} necrotic damage.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.
Soul Barbs
Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe takes 15...27...30 damage when an enchantment or hex is cast on that target.

spell.name: Vampiric Gaze
entries: Stare into the soul of a creature, stealing some of their life essence.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Vampiric Gaze
Spell. Steal up to 18...52...60 Health from target foe.

spell.name: Vampiric Touch (Guild Wars)
entries: Siphon the life energy of the creature you touch.

Choose one creature within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d10} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.
Vampiric Touch
Skill. Touch target foe to steal up to 29...65...74 Health.

spell.name: Lava Font
entries: Create fissures around you, which spew out lava, melting everything within range.

Conjure a 10-foot radius, 10-foot high stationary lava font at your location for the duration. Each creature, other than you, must make a Dexterity saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d8} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
{@bold While Overcast.} The radius of the spell increases by 5 feet.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.
Lava Font

Spell. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location where this spell was cast are struck for 5...41...50 fire damage each second. If you are Overcast, this spell strikes nearby foes instead of adjacent ones.

spell.name: Ether Feast
entries: Siphon the energy of a creature to heal yourself.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's next initiative roll gets reduced by {@dice 1d8}. On a successful save, the target's next initiative roll gets reduced by half as much.
Initiative cannot be reduced below 0 with this spell.
If this spell reduces the target's initiative, you regain hit points equal to four times the initiative lost.

components.m: a shaving of ice

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Glyph of Lesser Energy
entries: Invoke the Glyph of Lesser Energy by drawing it into the air as a glowing symbol.
For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level, the spell does not expend a spell slot. After this spell triggers {@dice 1d4 + 1} times, this spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Cyclone Axe
entries: Imbue your weapon with magical force, to strike everyone around you.
Target each creature, other than you, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects.

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: Cyclone Axe
Axe Attack. Perform a spinning axe attack striking for +4...10...12 damage to all adjacent opponents.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Executioner's Strike
entries: You strike with extreme ferocity, attempting a killing blow.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 4d8} damage.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 8 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 8 adrenaline per level above the original level.
Executioner's Strike
Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage.

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the number of attacks increases by 1. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the number of attacks increases by 2. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 3.

spell.name: Hammer Bash
entries: You put your entire weight into an extremely heavy blow.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 6 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 6 adrenaline per level above the original level.
Hammer Bash
Hammer Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If Hammer Bash hits, your target is knocked down.

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd or 3rd level, the number of attacks increases by 1. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the number of attacks increases by 2. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 3.

spell.name: Sever Artery
entries: You attempt to make your enemy bleed out.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 6 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 6 adrenaline per level above the original level.
Sever Artery
Sword Attack. If this attack hits, the opponent begins Bleeding for 5...21...25 seconds, losing Health over time.

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd or 3rd level, the number of attacks increases by 1. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the number of attacks increases by 2. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 3.

spell.name: Power Shot
entries: You infuse your next projectile with deadly force.
Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d6 + 10} force damage.
Power Shot
Bow Attack. If Power Shot hits, target foe takes 25...45...50 damage. .

m.text: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Aura of Restoration
entries: You envelop yourself in a restorative aura, which cycles your spell energy to heal yourself.
For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} per spell slot level.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Aura of Restoration
Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, you gain 0...1...1 Energy and are healed for 200...440...500% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

components.m: a pouch of mixed seeds and a pinte of water

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blinding Flash
entries: Conjure an extremely bright flash of light right in front of a creature's eyes.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition blinded} for the duration.
Blinding Flash
Spell. Target foe is Blinded for 3...7...8 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Conjure Phantasm
entries: Conjure an illusory phantasm in a creature's mind, tormenting it.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 2d10} psychic damage.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Conjure Phantasm
Hex Spell. For 2...13...16 seconds, target foe experiences -5 Health degeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Imagined Burden
entries: Create the illusion of heavy weight.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The Target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the target's speed is halved.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Imagined Burden
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Shatter Delusions
entries: Shatter a harmful spell on a creature to deal damage to everyone around it.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. The latest harmful spell of 1st level or higher on the target ends. If a harmful spell was ended this way, target each creature in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. A target takes {@damage 4d6} psychic damage.
Shatter Delusions
Spell. Remove one Mesmer hex from target foe. If a hex was removed, that foe and all adjacent foes takes 15...63...75 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Healing Signet
entries: Focus on healing yourself, leaving you exposed.
You regain hit points equal to {@dice 4d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
For the duration, you have vulnerability to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
{@bold Signet.} Casting this spell does not cost a spell slot. Once you cast this spell, you cannot do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
Healing Signet
Signet. You gain 82...154...172 Health. You have -40 armor while using this skill.

spell.name: Comfort Animal
entries: You comfort a friendly animal with a soothing word and a reassuring gesture.
Choose one friendly beast that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spell casting ability modifier.

Alternatively, you touch a beast that has died within the last minute. The target returns to life with 1 hit point. This spell can't return to life a beast that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
This spell can be used instead of the {@spell Charm Animal|GuildWars} spell, to maintain the {@condition charmed} condition on a beast {@condition charmed} by it.
Comfort Animal

Skill. You heal your animal companion for 20...87...104 Health. If your companion is dead, it is resurrected with 10...48...58% Health. If you have Comfort Animal equipped, your animal companion will travel with you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Dual Shot
entries: You duplicate your next projectile.
Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make two ranged weapon attacks against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects.
Dual Shot
Bow Attack. Shoot two arrows simultaneously at target foe. These arrows deal 25% less damage.

m.text: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Ignite Arrows
entries: Tip your arrows with explosives.
For the duration, your ranged weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d4} fire damage in a 5-foot radius around the attack target.
{@bold Preparation.} If you cast a new preparation, this preparation ends.
Ignite Arrows
Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows explode on contact, dealing 3...15...18 fire damage to target and all adjacent foes.

components.m: glue and bat guano

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Point Blank Shot
entries: You shoot an enemy point-blank.

Choose one creature that you can see within half the range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d8} damage.

At 5th level, the ranged attack also deals an extra {@damage 1d8} piercing damage to the target on a hit. This damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 2d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 3d8}).
Point Blank Shot
Bow Attack. Shoot an arrow that has half the normal range, but strikes for +10...34...40 damage.

m.text: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

spell.name: Troll Unguent
entries: You apply some healing troll unguent to yourself.
For the duration at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} hit points.
If you drop to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Troll Unguent
Skill. For 13 seconds, you gain +3...9...10 Health regeneration.

components.m: a mixture of herbs, swamp water and love

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Disrupting Chop

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of using an ability or casting a spell.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
If an ability or spell failed this way, the ability/spell can't be used again for the duration.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 6 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 3 adrenaline per level above the original level.
Disrupting Chop
Axe Attack. If it hits, this attack interrupts the target's current action. If that action was a skill, that skill is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Kindle Arrows
entries: Ignite your arrows.
For the duration, your ranged weapon attacks deal fire damage and deal an additional {@damage 1d4} fire damage.
{@bold Preparation.} If you cast a new preparation, this preparation ends.

components.m: flint and steel

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Kindle Arrows
Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows deal fire damage and hit for an additional 3...20...24 fire damage.

spell.name: Judge's Insight
entries: Imbue a creature with holy energy, and give them insight into their enemies defenses.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target's weapon attacks deal radiant damage and gain the Armor Penetration property.
{@bold Armor Penetration.}  This attack's radiant damage cannot be reduced in any way, except by immunities.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Judge's Insight
Enchantment Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target ally's attacks deal holy damage and have +20% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Enfeebling Blood
entries: Corrupt some of your own blood, to weaken an area.
{@bold Sacrifice.} You lose health equal to 10% of your maximum hit points.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition weakness|GuildWars|weakened} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Enfeebling Blood
Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes suffer from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds.

components.m: a drop of AB blood

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Epidemic
entries: Make your enemies conditions contagious.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Target each creature other than the chosen target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature gains a copy of each of the following conditions on the chosen target: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars}, {@condition Charmed}, {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Exhaustion}, {@condition Frightened}, {@condition Poisoned}, {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Epidemic
Spell. Spread all negative conditions and their remaining durations from target foe to all foes adjacent to your target.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Enervating Charge
entries: Fire a jolt of electricity, weakening on hit.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 5d6} lightning damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition weakness|GuildWars|weakened} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
{@bold Armor Penetration.}  This spell's lightning damage cannot be reduced in any way, except by immunities.
Enervating Charge
Spell. Target foe is struck for 25...45...50 lightning damage and suffers from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Wary Stance
entries: You enter a stance, to block any incoming melee spell.

For the duration, if you are the target of a spell which requires a melee attack roll, the attack roll misses you, your next initiative roll gets increased by {@dice 1d4} and you gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of adrenalin.
When you cast a spell, this spell ends.
{@bold Stance.} If you enter a new stance, this stance ends.
{@bold Adrenaline.} Adrenaline must be used to cast some spells instead of expending a spell slot.
Wary Stance
Stance. For 1...5...6 second[s], you block any attack skills used against you. For each successful block, you gain adrenaline and 5 Energy. Wary Stance ends if you use a skill.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Predator's Pounce
entries: Command your pet to attempt a Predator's Pounce.

Choose one beast, which obeys your verbal commands, that can hear you within range. The beast uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the beast can see within the beast's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d6} damage, and the beast regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Predator's Pounce
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Predator's Pounce that deals +5...29...35 damage. If that attack hits, your animal companion gains 5...41...50 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Restore Life
entries: You touch a creature that has died within the last minute. The target returns to life with 40% of their maximum hit points. This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
Restore Life
Spell. Touch the body of a fallen party member. Target party member is returned to life with 20...56...65% Health and 42...80...90% Energy.

components.m: gems worth 300 gp, which the spell consumes

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the % increases by 10%  for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Insidious Parasite
entries: You magically implant a life sucking parasite.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target succeeds on an attack roll, the target takes {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Insidious Parasite
Hex Spell. For 5...13...15 seconds, whenever target foe hits with an attack, you steal up to 15...39...45 Health from that foe.

components.m: a phial of swamp water

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Physical Resistance
entries: Enhance your physical defense at the cost of becoming vulnerable to elemental damage.
For the duration, you have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage, but have vulnerability to acid, cold, fire, lightning, and thunder damage.
{@bold Stance.} If you enter a new stance, this stance ends.
Physical Resistance
Stance. For 30...78...90 seconds, You gain +40 armor against physical damage, but you lose 24...14...12 armor against elemental damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Immolate
entries: Ignite a creature with searing flames.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 6d6} fire damage and starts {@condition burning|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d6} damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Immolate
Spell. Target foe is struck for 20...64...75 fire damage and is set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Hunter's Shot
entries: Fire a well aimed shot to make a creature bleed.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

At 5th level, the ranged attack also deals an extra {@damage 1d8} piercing damage to the target on a hit. This damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 2d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 3d8}).
Hunter's Shot
Bow Attack. If this attack hits, your target bleeds for 3...21...25 seconds.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

spell.name: Heal Area
entries: Heal every creature in an area around you.
Target each creature within range. A target regains hit points equal to {@dice 4d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Heal Area
Spell. Heal yourself and all adjacent creatures for 30...150...180 points.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Dark Pact
entries: Call upon a dark force, sacrificing blood to inflict harm.
{@bold Sacrifice.} You lose health equal to 10% of your maximum hit points.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d4} necrotic damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 2d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 6d4}), 11th level ({@dice 8d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 10d4}).
Dark Pact
Spell. Deal 10...40...48 shadow damage to target foe.

races.name: Half-Elf (Variant; Moon Elf or Sun Elf Descent)

components.m: a drop of your own blood and a half dozen candles

spell.name: Chaos Storm
entries: Conjure a storm of chaotic energy, harming and draining the energy from an area for multiple rounds.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Charisma saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. Choose one of the d8s. The number rolled on that die determines the spell's damage type, as shown below.
If you roll the same number on two or more d8s, a target's next initiative roll gets reduced by the number.
Initiative cannot be reduced below 0 with this spell.
Chaos Storm
Spell. Create a Chaos Storm at target foe's location that lasts for 10 seconds. Each second, foes adjacent to this location take 5...21...25 damage and lose 0...2...2 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Armor of Earth
entries: Encase yourself in a shielding armor of earth, improving your defense at the cost of your agility.
For the duration, your speed is reduced by 50%, and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Armor of Earth
Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, you gain 24...53...60 armor, but move 50...21...14% slower.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the % decreases by 5% for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: For Great Justice!
entries: You shout "For Great Justice!" to pump yourself up, generating Adrenaline on hit and when getting hit.
For the duration, your adrenaline gain is doubled. Additionally, you gain one strike of adrenaline when you take damage, or when you hit with a weapon attack.
When this spell ends, you lose all adrenaline.
{@bold Adrenaline.} Adrenaline must be used to cast some spells instead of expending a spell slot.
"For Great Justice!"
Shout. For 20 seconds, whenever you gain adrenaline, you gain 100% more.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Call of Haste
entries: Call to your pet to imbue it with haste.

Choose one beast, which obeys your verbal commands, that can hear you within range. For the duration, the target can attack one additional time when it takes the attack action on its turn and the target's speed increases by 10 feet.
Call of Haste
Shout. For 30 seconds, your animal companion has a 33% faster attack speed and moves 33% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the speed increases by 10 feet for each slot level above 3rd and the number of attacks increases by 1 for every three slot levels above 3rd.

spell.name: Heal Party
entries: Heal your party.
Choose any number of friendly creatures within range. A target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.
Heal Party
Spell. Heal entire party for 30...66...75 Health.

spell.name: Mark of Pain
entries: You magically inscribe a mark of pain on a creature, which causes all creatures around to take damage when it takes physical damage.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target takes bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage, target each creature other than the target in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. A target takes {@damage 4d6} necrotic damage.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Mark of Pain
Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, whenever target foe takes physical damage, Mark of Pain deals 10...34...40 shadow damage to adjacent foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Distortion
entries: You magically distort space around you, making attacks miss you.
For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC. If an attack misses you because of this bonus, your next initiative roll gets reduced by {@dice 1d6} or this spell ends.
Initiative cannot be reduced below 0 with this spell.
{@bold Stance.} If you enter a new stance, this stance ends.
Distortion
Stance. For 1...4...5 second[s], you have a 75% chance to block attacks. Whenever you block an attack this way, you lose 2 Energy or Distortion ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Fear Me!
entries: Intimidate nearby creatures to give you an opportunity to slip past their defenses, reducing their initiative and increasing your chance to critical hit them.

Target each creature other than you that can hear you within range. Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target's next initiative roll gets reduced by {@dice 1d8} and the number you need to roll to score a critical hit against a target gets reduced by {@dice 1d4} for the duration. On a successful save, a target's next initiative roll gets reduced by half as much, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends.
Initiative cannot be reduced below 0 with this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.
"Fear Me!"
Shout. All nearby foes lose 1...3...4 Energy. For 1...12...15 second[s], your melee attacks gain +5...25...30% chance of a critical hit against stationary foes.

spell.name: Earth Attunement
entries: Empower your earth magic, by attuning to the earth.
For the Duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast an earth themed spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

components.m: a small shovel and a bucket

entries: Earth Attunement
Enchantment Spell. For 36...55...60 seconds, you are attuned to Earth. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Earth Magic.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 24 hours.

spell.name: Dismember
entries: You attempt to sever off a body part.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 5 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 5 adrenaline per level above the original level.
Dismember
Axe Attack. If it hits, this axe blow will inflict a Deep Wound on the target foe, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the number of attacks increases by 1. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the number of attacks increases by 2. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 3.

spell.name: Jagged Strike
entries: Slash at your foe with a serrated edge.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
{@bold Lead Attack.} On a hit, this attack is considered a lead attack. Additionally, you can, immediately after you hit, cast an off-hand attack spell as an action or bonus action.

At 5th level, the melee attack also deals an extra {@damage 1d8} piercing damage to the target on a hit. This damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 2d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 3d8}).
Jagged Strike
Lead Attack. If Jagged Strike hits, your target suffers from Bleeding for 5...17...20 seconds.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the light property

races.name: Half-Elf (Variant; Moon Elf or Sun Elf Descent)

spell.name: Fox Fangs
entries: Slip past your foes defenses with a foxes' agility.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d6} damage.
{@bold Unblockable.} This spell ignores any temporary bonuses to AC.

{@bold Off-Hand Attack.} This attack must follow a lead attack and can be cast as a bonus action if the action this turn was a lead attack. On a hit, this attack is considered an off-hand attack. Additionally, you can, immediately after you hit, cast a dual attack spell as an action or bonus action.
Fox Fangs
Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a lead attack. Fox Fangs cannot be blocked and strikes for +10...30...35 damage if it hits.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the light property

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Horns of the Ox
entries: Strike your foe with the strength of an ox.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make two melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d6} damage and, if the target is not within 5-feet of one of the target's allies, is knocked {@condition prone}.
{@bold Dual Attack.} This attack must follow an off-hand attack and can be cast as a bonus action if the action this turn was an off-hand attack. On a hit, this attack is considered a dual attack.
Horns of the Ox
Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, Horns of the Ox strikes for +1...9...11 damage. If struck foe is not adjacent to any allies, that foe is knocked down.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the light property

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Scorpion Wire
entries: Magically attach yourself to a creature, if that creature moves far away from you, teleport to them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw; a creature can choose to fail this saving throw if it wishes. On a failed save for the duration, the next time the target is not within range, you can teleport within 5 feet of the target to an unoccupied space. The target is knocked {@condition prone}.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Scorpion Wire
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, the next time you and target foe are more than 100' apart, you Shadow Step to that foe and that foe is knocked down. This spell has half the normal range.

components.m: a long piece of wire

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3r level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Distracting Shot

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of using an ability or casting a spell.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
If an ability or spell failed this way, the ability/spell can't be used again for the duration.
Distracting Shot
Bow Attack. If Distracting Shot hits, it interrupts target foe's action but deals only 1...13...16 damage. If the interrupted action was a skill, that skill is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Parasitic Bond
entries: Magically implant a parasite into a creature, harming them until they die and gaining health on their death.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d4} necrotic damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the spell ends.
When this spell ends, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
This spell's damage and healing increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).
Parasitic Bond
Hex Spell. For 20 seconds, target foe suffers -1 Health degeneration. The caster is healed for 30...102...120 when Parasitic Bond ends.

races.name: Half-Elf (Variant; Moon Elf or Sun Elf Descent)

spell.name: Diversion
entries: Create a diversion to distract a creature, causing their next ability or spell to be temporarily forgotten.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the next spell or ability the target uses can't be used again for the duration.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Diversion
Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe uses a skill, that skill takes an additional 10...47...56 seconds to recharge.

components.m: a shiny silver coin

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Eruption
entries: Cause an eruption of dust and rocks at a location of your choosing.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, each creature in a 15-foot-radius, 60-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage and is {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Eruption
Spell. Cause an Eruption at target foe's location. Each second for 5 seconds, foes near this location are struck for 10...34...40 earth damage and are Blinded for 10 seconds.

components.m: a pinch of sand and a fan

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Endure Pain
entries: Greatly increase your pain tolerance for a short duration.
For the duration, your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by {@dice 3d10} + Constitution modifier.
Endure Pain
Skill. For 7...16...18 seconds you have an additional 90...258...300 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, your hit points increase by an additional {@dice 2d10} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Lightning Reflexes
entries: You magically enhance your reflexes and attack speed.
For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC and you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn.
{@bold Stance.} If you enter a new stance, this stance ends.
Lightning Reflexes
Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks, and you attack 33% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Live Vicariously
entries: Imbue a creature's strikes with holy energy, healing yourself every time that creature hits with an attack.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target hits with an attack, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4}.

{@bold Bond.} For the duration, your spell save DC and spell attack bonus are reduced by 1.  You can have a maximum number of bonds active at any one time, equal to your spell casting ability modifier (minimum 1). The bond ends if the target of your bond is ever not within 300 feet of you, or you fall {@condition unconscious}. You can end a bond at any time (no action required).

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Live Vicariously
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally hits a foe, you gain 2...14...17 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the reduction to your spell save DC and spell attack bonus increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Putrid Explosion
entries: Explode a corpse.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target to target each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d6} necrotic. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Putrid Explosion
Spell. The corpse nearest your target explodes, sending out a shockwave that deals 24...101...120 damage to nearby foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Energy Burn
entries: Make the energy in a creature burn it up from the inside.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's next initiative roll gets reduced by {@dice 1d6}. Initiative cannot be reduced below 0 with this spell.
If this spell reduces the target's initiative, the target takes 5 psychic damage per initiative lost. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Energy Burn
Spell. Target foe loses 1...8...10 Energy and takes 9 damage for each point of Energy lost.

spell.name: Frozen Burst
entries: Make spikes of ice burst out from you, slowing creatures down.

Target each creature other than you within range. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} cold damage, and for the duration the target's speed is reduced by 66%.
