entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Strip Enchantment
entries: Strip the latest beneficial spell on a hostile creature to steal life from it.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the latest beneficial spell on the target ends. If a beneficial spell was ended this way, the target takes {@dice 3d6} necrotic damage per spell ended, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
Strip Enchantment
Spell. Remove 0...2...2 enchantment[s] from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, you steal 5...53...65 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, one additional spell ends for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Drain Enchantment
entries: Drain a beneficial spell on a hostile creature to heal yourself and improve your initiative.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The Target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the latest beneficial spell on the target ends. If a beneficial spell was ended this way, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier and your next initiative roll gets increased by {@dice 2d6}.
Drain Enchantment
Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, you gain 8...15...17 Energy and 40...104...120 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd and the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ice Spear
entries: Conjure up an ice spear and hurl it at a creature, healing yourself if you are {@condition overcast|GuildWars}.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d6} cold damage.
{@bold While Overcast}. At the start of your next turn, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d6}.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Ice Spear
Enchantment Spell. Send out an Ice Spear, striking target foe for 10...50...60 cold damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, you gain +1...3...4 Health regeneration for 5 seconds.

components.m: a drop of water

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage and healing each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Swift Chop
entries: Deliver a swift chop which is sure to hit.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d8} damage.
On a miss, the target takes {@damage 1d8} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Swift Chop
Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +1...16...20 damage. If Swift Chop is blocked, target foe takes 1...16...20 damage and suffers a Deep Wound for 20 seconds.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Call of Protection
entries: Call out to your animal companions, protecting them with abjuration magic.
Choose any number of friendly beasts, which obey your verbal commands, that can hear you within. When a target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d12} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Call of Protection
Shout. For 120 seconds, your animal companion has a 5...17...20 base damage reduction.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Succor
entries: Grant a person succor by healing them every turn and improving their initiative.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains 2 hit points. Additionally, when the creature would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 1st level, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 19 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.

{@bold Bond.} For the duration, your spell save DC and spell attack bonus are reduced by 1.  You can have a maximum number of bonds active at any one time, equal to your spell casting ability modifier (minimum 1). The bond ends if the target of your bond is ever not within 300 feet of you, or you fall {@condition unconscious}. You can end a bond at any time (no action required).

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Succor
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this Enchantment, target other ally gains +1 Health and +1 Energy regeneration, but you lose 1 Energy each time that ally casts a Spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the reduction to your spell save DC and spell attack bonus increases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd, the healing increases each by 2 for each slot level above 3rd and the number you need to roll decreases by 1 for every two slot levels above 3rd.

spell.name: Suffering
entries: Utter a foul curse, causing suffering in an area.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of a target's turns, a target takes {@damage 2d4} necrotic damage.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Suffering
Hex Spell. For 6...25...30 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer -0...2...3 Health degeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Inspired Hex
entries: Remove a negative spell on a creature, gain initiative and replace this spell with the removed spell for the duration.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. The latest harmful spell on the target ends. If a harmful spell was ended this way, your next initiative roll gets increased by {@dice 2d4} and replace this spell with the ended spell for the duration.
Inspired Hex
Spell. Remove a hex from target ally and gain 4...9...10 Energy. For 20 seconds, Inspired Hex is replaced with the hex that was removed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Stoning
entries: Hurl a large stone at a creature, potentially knocking them {@condition prone} if they are weak.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage and if the target is {@condition weakness|GuildWars|weakened} is knocked {@condition prone}.
Stoning
Spell. Send out a large stone, striking target foe for 45...93...105 earth damage if it hits. If Stoning hits a foe suffering from Weakness, that foe is knocked down

components.m: a large rock

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Together as One!
entries: Inspire your allies to deal more damage with attacks and regain health every turn.

Choose any number of friendly creatures that can hear you and are within 20-foot of you, or any beast which obey your verbal commands within range. For the duration, a target's weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d6} damage and at the start of each of a target's turns, a target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4}.
If a target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends on that target.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
"Together as One!"
Elite Shout. For 3...13...15 seconds, all party members near you or near your pet deal +5...13...15 additional damage with attacks and gain +1...6...7 Health regeneration. PvE Skil

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for every two slot levels above 5th and the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Aura of the Lich
entries: Don the necrotic aura of a powerful lich, creating {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars|Bone Horrors} from all corpses in range and increasing the potency of your death magic spells.

Target each non-undead dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, within range. Exploit each target, turning them into a {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars}. Then create an additional {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} at your location.
A {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} remains for the duration or until it reaches zero hit points, at which point it will disintegrate into ash.

A {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} is friendly to you and your allies while you are conscious. If you fall {@condition unconscious}, a {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} becomes hostile towards everything. A {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. A {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} is in the DMs control.
For the duration, when you cast a death themed spell of 1st level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Aura of the Lich

Elite Enchantment Spell. All corpses within earshot are exploited and you animate a level 1...14...17 bone horror plus one for each corpse exploited in this way. For 5...37...45 seconds, your Death Magic attribute is increased by +1.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th or 8th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 9th level, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Echo
entries: Create an echo of the next spell you cast, casting it twice in quick succession.
For the duration, the next time you finish casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, you cast that spell again (no action required), without expending a spell slot or requiring material components.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Echo
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, Echo is replaced with the next skill you use. Echo acts as this skill for 30 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number of casts increases by 1 for every two slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ether Prodigy
entries: Channel the latent energy of the ether into you, improving your spellcasting.
For the duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 1st level, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 9 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Overcast.} You become {@condition overcast|GuildWars} for 5 rounds.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Ether Prodigy
Elite Enchantment Spell. Lose all enchantments. For 8...18...20 seconds, you gain +6 Energy regeneration. When Ether Prodigy ends, you lose 2 Health for each point of Energy you have.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Crippling Shot
entries: Fire a shot attempting to cripple a creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and is {@condition crippled|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
{@bold Unblockable.} This spell ignores any temporary bonuses to AC.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Crippling Shot
Elite Bow Attack. If Crippling Shot hits, your target becomes Crippled for 1...9...11 second[s]. This attack cannot be blocked.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Amity
entries: Magically convince a group of creatures to be pacifist, this lasts until a creature takes damage.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, regardless of a target's abilities or magic items, a target can't make melee or ranged weapon attacks.
When a target takes damage, this spell ends on that target.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Amity
Elite Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, adjacent foes cannot attack. For each foe, Amity ends if that foe takes damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Blood is Power
entries: Sacrifice some of your own blood to fuel a creature's spells.
{@bold Sacrifice.} You lose health equal to 33% of your maximum hit points.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the creature would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 1st level, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Blood is Power
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, target other ally gains +3...5...6 Energy regeneration.

components.m: a small knife

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number you need to roll decreases by 1 for every 2 slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Energy Drain
entries: Siphon energy from a creature to gain it yourself.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's next initiative roll gets reduced by {@dice 2d8}. On a successful save, the target's next initiative roll gets reduced by half as much.
Initiative cannot be reduced below 0 with this spell.
If this spell reduces the target's initiative, your next initiative roll gets increased by thrice the initiative lost.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Energy Drain
Elite Spell. Target foe loses 2...8...9 Energy. You gain 3 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ether Renewal
entries: Use the ether to heal yourself and improve your initiative per beneficial spell on you when casting a spell of 1st level or higher.

For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d6} per beneficial spell on you and your next initiative roll gets increased by {@dice 1d6} per beneficial spell on you.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Ether Renewal
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, each time you cast a spell, you gain 1...3...4 Energy and 5...17...20 Health for each enchantment on you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd and the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Escape
entries: Become nimble, attempting to escape.
For the duration, your speed increases by 33%, and you have a +5 bonus to AC.
{@bold Stance.} If you enter a new stance, this stance ends.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Escape
Elite Stance. For 1...7...8 second[s], you move 33% faster and have a 75% chance to block attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Aura of Faith
entries: Sheath an ally in an aura of faith, reducing all damage they take and increasing the healing they receive.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 4d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, when the target regains hit points, they regain 50% more hit points.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Aura of Faith
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 3 seconds, target ally gains 50...90...100% more Health when healed and takes 5...41...50% less damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the % increases by 10% for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Feast of Corruption
entries: Summon the ravenous maw of {@condition corruption|GuildWars}, feasting on everything in an area, damaging and potentially stealing health from everything in its maw.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d8} necrotic damage. If a target was under the effect of a detrimental spell, a target takes an additional {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of that necrotic damage dealt. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Feast of Corruption
Elite Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 16...67...80 shadow damage. You steal up to 8...34...40 Health from each struck foe who is suffering from a hex.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Energy Surge
entries: Make the energy in a group of creatures burn them up from the inside.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target's next initiative roll gets reduced by {@dice 1d6}. Initiative cannot be reduced below 0 with this spell.
If this spell reduces a target's initiative, a target takes 5 psychic damage per initiative lost. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Energy Surge
Elite Spell. Target foe loses 1...8...10 Energy. For each point of Energy lost, that foe and all nearby foes take 9 damage.

spell.name: Glimmering Mark
entries: Inscribe a glimmering mark into the flesh of an enemy with lightning, damaging them and everyone around them every turn and inflicting blind.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, target each creature in a 10-foot-radius centered on the target. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} lightning damage and is {@condition blinded} for 1 round. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
If you target the creature with a spell, this spell ends.
{@bold Armor Penetration.} This spell's lightning damage cannot be reduced in any way, except by immunities.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Glimmering Mark

Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe and all foes adjacent to your target take 5...21...25 damage each second. Foes using attack skills are Blinded for 3 seconds. This hex ends if you use a skill that targets this foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Charge!
entries: Shout "Charge!" to inspire your allies to move faster.
Target each friendly creature that can hear you within range. End the {@condition crippled|GuildWars} condition on a target and for the duration a target's speed is increased by 33%.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
"Charge!"
Elite Shout. Allies in earshot lose the Crippled condition. For 5...11...13 seconds, these allies move 33% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ferocious Strike
entries: Command your pet to attempt a Ferocious Strike.

Choose one beast, which obeys your verbal commands, that can hear you within range. The beast uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the beast can see within the beast's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 4d6} damage, and your next initiative roll gets increased by {@dice 4d4}.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Ferocious Strike
Elite Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Ferocious Strike that deals +13...25...28 damage. If that attack hits, you gain adrenaline and 3...9...10 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Judgment Strike
entries: Imbue your fist with holy might, to strike everyone around you.

Target each creature, other than you, that you can see within range. Make a melee spell attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 4d6} radiant damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target is knocked {@condition prone}.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Judgment Strike
Elite Melee Attack. Attack target and adjacent foes. Each attack that hits deals +13...27...30 Holy damage [sic] and knocks down attacking foes. PvE Skill

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Grenth's Balance
entries: Invoke the god of death and ice and balance out your health with a creature of your choice.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, if the target has more hit points than you do, you regain hit points equal to up to half the difference and the target takes necrotic damage equal to the amount of hit points you gained. On a successful save, you regain hit points equal to up to a quarter the difference, and the target takes necrotic damage equal to the amount of hit points you gained.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Grenth's Balance

Elite Spell. If target foe has more Health than you, you gain half the difference (up to your maximum Health), and that foe loses an equal amount. If this foe has less Health than you, you lose half the difference, and that foe gains an equal amount.

components.m: a small silver scale

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 9th level, the target makes its saving throw with disadvantage.

spell.name: Fevered Dreams
entries: Spin out your foes condition induced dreams, infecting creatures around them with conditions every time they suffer from a new one.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target gains a condition, target each creature other than the target in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature gains a copy of the condition gained if it's one of the following conditions: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars}, {@condition Charmed}, {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Exhaustion}, {@condition Frightened}, {@condition Poisoned}, {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}.
Additionally, if the target is suffering from two or more conditions, the target is {@condition dazed|GuildWars} for 1 round.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Fevered Dreams

Elite Hex Spell. For 10...22...25 seconds, whenever target foe suffers from a new condition, all foes in the area suffer from that condition as well. If target foe has two or more conditions that foe is Dazed for 1...3...3 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Glyph of Energy
entries: Invoke the Glyph of Energy by drawing it into the air as a glowing symbol.

For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level or lower (except Glyph of Energy), the spell does not expend a spell slot, does not cause {@condition overcast|GuildWars}, and you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting. After this spell triggers {@dice 1d4 + 1} times, this spell ends.
Glyph of Energy
Elite Glyph. Your next 1...3...3 spell[s] do[es] not cause Overcast and cost[s] 10...22...25 less Energy to cast. Your elemental attributes are increased by 1...2...2.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Victory Is Mine!
entries: Gloat over the suffering of a creature afflicted by multiple conditions, gaining health and initiative in the process.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. You regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier per condition on the target, and your next initiative roll gets increased by {@dice 1d4} per condition on the target.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
"Victory Is Mine!"
Elite Shout. You gain 10...56...68 Health and 3...6...7 Energy for each condition suffered by target foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Greater Conflagration
entries: Call forth a spirit of fire, which converts all physical damage to fire damage.
Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit and takes bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage, they take fire damage instead.

{@bold Summoning Ritual} Only one of each type of Summoning Ritual can be active at a time, if a new one is created in the range of this Summoning Ritual, this one ends. The spirit created by this ritual uses the {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars} stat block.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Greater Conflagration
Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all physical damage is fire damage instead. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

components.m: a candle

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block and when you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Life Barrier
entries: Create a divine barrier around a creature, permanently decreasing the damage they take.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 4d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
If you are below 50% of your maximum hit points, this spell ends.

{@bold Bond.} For the duration, your spell save DC and spell attack bonus are reduced by 1. You can have a maximum number of bonds active at any one time, equal to your spell casting ability modifier (minimum 1). The bond ends if the target of your bond is ever not within 300 feet of you, or you fall {@condition unconscious}. You can end a bond at any time (no action required).

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Life Barrier

Elite Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, damage dealt to target other ally is reduced by 20...44...50%. If your Health is below 50% when that ally takes damage, Life Barrier ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the reduction to your spell save DC and spell attack bonus increases by 1 for each slot level above 4th, and you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Life Transfer
entries: Create a tether of life essence between you and a group of creatures, siphoning away their vitality.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of a target's turns, a target takes {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Life Transfer
Elite Hex Spell. For 6...11...12 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes suffer -3...7...8 Health degeneration, which you gain as Health regeneration.

spell.name: Illusionary Weaponry
entries: Conjure up an Illusionary Sword for the duration.

This magic sword lasts until the spell ends. It counts as a simple melee weapon with which you are proficient. It deals {@damage 2d8} psychic damage on a hit or miss, cannot critical hit and has the finesse and light property.
While wielding the sword, when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} for every two illusion themed spells you have prepared and subtract the number rolled from the damage.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Illusionary Weaponry

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit. Instead, Illusionary Weaponry deals 8...34...40 damage to your targets for each melee attack. You have +5 armor for each equipped Illusion Magic skill.

components.m: a sword hilt

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a 3rd- or 4th-level spell slot, the damage increases to {@dice 3d8}. When you cast it using a 5th- or 6th-level spell slot, the damage increases to {@dice 4d8}. When you cast it using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage increases to {@dice 5d8}.

spell.name: Glyph of Renewal
entries: Etch a glyph of renewal into the air, causing your next spell slot to come back quicker.
For the duration, the next time you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, the spell slot expended in that casting is regained when you finish a short rest instead of a long rest.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Glyph of Renewal
Elite Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next spell instantly recharges.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Battle Rage
entries: Enter a battle rage, moving faster and generating adrenaline.
For the duration, your speed is increased by 33%, and you gain one strike of adrenaline when you hit with a weapon attack.
{@bold Stance.} If you enter a new stance, this stance ends.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 4 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 2 adrenaline per level above the original level.
{@bold Adrenaline.} Adrenaline must be used to cast some spells instead of expending a spell slot.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Battle Rage
Elite Stance. For 5...17...20 seconds, you move 33% faster and gain double adrenaline from attacks. Battle Rage ends if you use any non-adrenal skills.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Incendiary Arrows
entries: Fire multiple {@condition burning|GuildWars} arrows at a group of creatures.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Target up to three creatures in a 15-foot-radius centered on the target. Make a ranged weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and starts {@condition burning|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Incendiary Arrows
Elite Bow Attack. Shoot arrows at target foe and up to 2 foes near your target. Those foes are set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s].

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage of the {@condition burning|GuildWars} condition increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Mark of Protection
entries: Inscribe the mark of protection on an ally, converting all damage they take into healing.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, the target instead regains hit points equal to the damage they would have taken (maximum 5).
You cannot cast spells until the end of your next turn.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Mark of Protection

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target ally would take damage, that ally is healed for that amount instead, maximum 6...49...60. All your Protection Prayers are disabled for 5 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the maximum increases by 5 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Offering of Blood
entries: Offer your blood in a ritual to gain more magical power.
{@bold Sacrifice.} You lose health equal to 20% of your maximum hit points.
For the duration, when you cast a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell does not expend a spell slot. After this spell triggers {@dice 2d4} times, this spell ends.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Offering of Blood
Elite Spell. You gain 8...18...20 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for every three slot levels above 3rd.

spell.name: Ineptitude
entries: Create illusory arcane interference in the mind of a group of creatures, causing them damage and blindness the next time they attack.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the next time a target is about to make an attack roll, a target takes {@damage 4d6} psychic damage and is {@condition blinded} for 1 minute.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Ineptitude
Elite Hex Spell. For 4 seconds, the next time target foe or any adjacent foe attacks, they take 30...114...135 damage and are Blinded for 10 seconds.

components.m: a pinch of sand

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Mind Burn
entries: Use the power of your mind to sear a group of enemies, inflicting more damage and {@condition burning|GuildWars} if you have a higher initiative than them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d6} fire damage and if a target has a lower initiative than you, they take an additional {@damage 2d6} fire damage and start {@condition burning|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d4} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
{@bold Overcast.} You become {@condition overcast|GuildWars} for 3 rounds.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Mind Burn

Elite Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes take 15...51...60 fire damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe and all adjacent foes take an additional 15...51...60 fire damage and are set on fire for 1...8...10 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the fire damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st and the damage of the {@condition burning|GuildWars} condition increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Mind Freeze
entries: Use the power of your mind to freeze a group of enemies, inflicting more damage and slowing them down if you have a higher initiative than them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} cold damage and if a target has a lower initiative than you, they take an additional {@damage 3d6} cold damage and their speed is reduced by 90% to a minimum of 5 feet for the duration. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
{@bold Overcast.} You become {@condition overcast|GuildWars} for 3 rounds.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Mind Freeze

Elite Hex Spell. Target foe takes 10...50...60 cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers an additional 10...50...60 cold damage and moves 90% slower for 1...4...5 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Mind Shock
entries: Use the power of your mind to shock a group of enemies, inflicting more damage and knocking them {@condition prone} if you have a higher initiative than them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} lightning damage and if a target has a lower initiative than you, they take an additional {@damage 3d6} lightning damage and are knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
{@bold Armor Penetration.} This spell's lightning damage cannot be reduced in any way, except by immunities.
{@bold Overcast.} You become {@condition overcast|GuildWars} for 3 rounds.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Mind Shock

Elite Spell. Target foe suffers 10...42...50 lightning damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers 10...42...50 more lightning damage and is knocked down. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Cleave
entries: Enhance your weapon with powerful magic.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 3d8} damage.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 4 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 4 adrenaline per level above the original level.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Cleave
Elite Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...26...30 damage.

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd or 3rd level, the number of attacks increases by 1. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the number of attacks increases by 2. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 3.

spell.name: Marksman's Wager
entries: You make a wager with the spirit of the hunt, rewarding you with initiative every time you hit with a ranged weapon attack, but loosing initiative when missing.

For the duration, when you hit with a ranged weapon attack, your next initiative roll gets increased by {@dice 1d8}, but when you miss with a ranged weapon attack, your next initiative roll gets reduced by 10.
{@bold Preparation.} If you cast a new preparation, this preparation ends.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Marksman's Wager
Elite Preparation. For 18 seconds, you gain 5...9...10 Energy whenever your arrows hit, but lose 10 Energy whenever your arrows fail to strike.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Martyr
entries: Martyr yourself by transferring all conditions on allies to yourself.

Target each friendly creature other than you within range. You gain a copy of each of the following conditions on a target: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars}, {@condition Charmed}, {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Exhaustion}, {@condition Frightened}, {@condition Poisoned}, {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}. End all copied conditions on a target.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Martyr
Elite Spell. Transfer all conditions and their remaining durations from your allies to you.

spell.name: Order of the Vampire
entries: Induct your allies into the Order of the Vampire, giving their attacks life steal.
{@bold Sacrifice.} You lose health equal to 17% of your maximum hit points.

Target each friendly creature within range. For the duration, a target's weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage and a target regains hit points equal to the amount of that necrotic damage dealt.
{@bold Order.} If another order is applied to you, this order ends.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Order of the Vampire

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever a party member who is not under the effects of another Necromancer enchantment hits a foe with physical damage, that party member steals up to 3...13...16 Health.

components.m: a sharpened tooth

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Defy Pain
entries: Make yourself numb to pain for a short duration.

For the duration, your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by {@dice 3d10} + Constitution modifier and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 5 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 2 adrenaline per level above the original level.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Defy Pain
Elite Skill. For 20 seconds you have an additional 90...258...300 Health, an additional 20 armor, and you take -1...8...10 less damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, your hit points increase by an additional {@dice 2d10} for each slot level above 2nd and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Devastating Hammer
entries: Channel your adrenaline into a Devastating Bash, knocking {@condition prone} and inflicting {@condition weakness|GuildWars}.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone} and suffers from {@condition weakness|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 7 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 7 adrenaline per level above the original level.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Devastating Hammer
Elite Hammer Attack. If Devastating Hammer hits, your target is knocked down and suffers from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds.

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd or 3rd level, the number of attacks increases by 1. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the number of attacks increases by 2. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 3.

spell.name: Melandru's Arrows
entries: Sheath your arrows in Melandru's wild magic, making them inflict bleed and deal extra damage against enchanted foes.

For the duration, when you hit a target with a ranged weapon attack, they must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 2d4} damage. Additionally, if a target is under the effect of a beneficial spell, they take {@damage 2d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
{@bold Preparation.} If you cast a new preparation, this preparation ends.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Melandru's Arrows
Elite Preparation. For 18 seconds, whenever your arrows hit, they cause Bleeding for 3...21...25 seconds, and if they hit a target who is under an enchantment, they do +8...24...28 damage.

components.m: a hand full of sharp rocks

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd and the damage of the {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} condition increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Peace and Harmony
entries: Invoke peace and harmony on a creature, removing negative effects and reducing their duration.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. End the latest two of the following conditions on the target: {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition blinded|phb|Blindness}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars}, {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, or {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}. Additionally, the latest two harmful spells on the target end.
For the duration, conditions and harmful spells expire 90% faster on the target.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Peace and Harmony

Elite Enchantment Spell. Target ally loses 0...7...9 condition[s] and hex[es]. For 1...3...3 second[s], conditions and hexes expire 90% faster on that ally. All your Smiting Prayers are disabled for 20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, one additional spell and condition ends for each slot level above 2nd and the duration increases by 1 round for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Plague Signet
entries: Activate your Plague Signet to transfer most of your conditions to an enemy.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. The target gains a copy of each of the following conditions on yourself: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars}, {@condition Charmed}, {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Exhaustion}, {@condition Frightened}, {@condition Poisoned}, {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}. End all copied conditions on yourself.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
{@bold Signet.} Casting this spell does not cost a spell slot. Once you cast this spell, you cannot do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Plague Signet
Elite Signet. Transfer all negative conditions with 100...180...200% of their remaining durations from yourself to target foe. (50% failure chance with Curses 4 or less.)

spell.name: Dwarven Battle Stance
entries: Channel the ancient fighting style of the dwarfs, gaining an additional attack, taking less damage and disrupting foes with your attack as long as you are using a heavy weapon.

For the duration, if you are wielding a melee weapon with the heavy property, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn, when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 4d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage, and when you hit a target with a melee weapon attack, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target can't cast spells or use abilities until the end of their next turn.
{@bold Stance.} If you enter a new stance, this stance ends.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Dwarven Battle Stance
Elite Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, if you are wielding a hammer, you attack 33% faster, you gain +40 armor, and your attack skills interrupt foes when they hit.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the heavy property

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Melandru's Resilience
entries: Channel the nature goddess Melandru, reinforcing yourself with rejuvenating vines, healing every turn and potentially reducing your spell cost for each condition or hex affecting you.

For the duration, at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} per condition or harmful spell affecting you. Additionally, while at least suffering from one condition or harmful spell, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 1st level, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 19 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot. Reduce the number you need to roll by 1 for each condition or harmful spell affecting you beyond the first, to a minimum of 10.
If you drop to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
{@bold Stance.} If you enter a new stance, this stance ends.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Melandru's Resilience
Elite Stance. For 8...18...20 seconds, you gain +4 Health regeneration and +1 Energy regeneration for each condition and hex you are suffering.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Restore Condition
entries: Purge most conditions on a creature and heal them for each condition removed.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. End {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition blinded|phb|Blindness}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars}, {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, and {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars} on the target and the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} per condition removed.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Restore Condition

Elite Spell. Remove all conditions (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, and Deep Wound) from target other ally. For each condition removed, that ally is healed for 10...58...70 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Soul Leech
entries: Attach a soul leech to a creature, siphoning off health every time they cast a spell.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target casts a spell of 1st level or higher, the target takes {@damage 1d10} necrotic damage per spell slot level, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.
Soul Leech
Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, you steal up to 16...67...80 Health from that foe.

spell.name: Mantra of Recall
entries: Chant a mantra of recall, potentially regaining spend spell slots at the end of it.
For the duration, when you expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 3rd level or lower, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, you regain that spell slot when this spell ends.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Mantra of Recall
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, you gain no benefit from it. You gain 10...22...25 Energy when Mantra of Recall ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Mist Form
entries: Partially turn your body into mist, taking less damage from foes affected by water themed spells and healing all allies around you when casting an elemental spell.

For the duration, when you take damage from an enemy affected by one or more harmful water themed spells, you can roll {@dice 4d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, when you cast an elemental themed spell of 1st level or higher, choose any number of friendly creatures within 150-feet of you. A target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} per spell slot level.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Mist Form

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10...38...45 seconds, you take 33% less damage from foes under the effects of Water Magic hexes. Whenever you cast an elemental spell, all non-spirit allies in earshot are healed for 50...210...250% of the Energy cost of the spell.

components.m: a bottle of captured mist

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th and the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Earth Shaker
entries: Jump up into the air, shattering the earth around your target, knocking creatures {@condition prone} around them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Target each creature other than you in a 5-foot-radius centered on the target. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target is knocked {@condition prone}.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 8 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 8 adrenaline per level above the original level.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Earth Shaker
Elite Hammer Attack. Target foe and all adjacent foes are knocked down. (50% failure chance with Hammer Mastery 4 or less.)

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd or 3rd level, the number of attacks increases by 1. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the number of attacks increases by 2. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 3.

spell.name: Oath Shot
entries: Fire an all or nothing shot, which allows you to immediately cast another spell on a hit, but prevents you from using spells or abilities on a miss.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, and you can immediately cast another spell without requiring an action.
On a miss, you cannot cast spells or use abilities until the end of your next turn.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Oath Shot

Elite Bow Attack. If Oath Shot hits, all of your skills except Oath Shot are recharged. If it misses, all of your skills are disabled for 10...5...4 seconds. (50% miss chance with Expertise 7 or less.)

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Shield of Regeneration
entries: Conjure a magical shield, which heals a creature every turn and reduces all damage they take.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} and when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.
Shield of Regeneration
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...11...13 seconds, target ally gains +3...9...10 Health regeneration and 40 armor.

spell.name: Soul Taker
entries: Make your attacks rip the souls out of your foes body, dealing more damage but also hurting you every time you attack.
For the duration, when you make an attack with a weapon, you loose health equal to {@dice 2d4}. Additionally, your weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 4d6} damage.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Soul Taker
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 3...25...30 seconds, your attacks sacrifice 15...19...20 health and deal 15...19...20 more damage. PvE Skill

components.m: a small clouded pearl

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the additional weapon damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Mantra of Recovery
entries: Start chanting a mantra of recovery, allowing you to cast multiple spell per turn.
For the duration, you can cast spells as an action, even if you already cast a spell as a bonus action on your turn.
{@bold Stance.} If you enter a new stance, this stance ends.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Mantra of Recovery
Elite Stance. For 5...17...20 seconds, spells you cast recharge 33% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Obsidian Flesh
entries: Partially turn your flesh into obsidian, reducing the damage you take, making you non-targetable by spells but preventing you from attacking and reducing your ability to cast spells.

For the duration, you cannot be targeted by hostile spells and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, regardless of your abilities or magic items, you can't make melee or ranged weapon attacks.

{@bold Bond.} For the duration, your spell save DC and spell attack bonus are reduced by 2.  You can have a maximum number of bonds active at any one time, equal to your spell casting ability modifier (minimum 1). The bond ends if the target of your bond is ever not within 300 feet of you, or you fall {@condition unconscious}. You can end a bond at any time (no action required).

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Obsidian Flesh
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, you gain +20 armor and cannot be the target of enemy spells, but cannot attack and have -2 energy degeneration.
